welcome_message_body: Welcome to Westland, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and vibrant downtown area, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving mainly Delta Air Lines and its SkyTeam partners.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving mainly low-cost carriers and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal is available for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pontiac Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
